articles.title: ANC and DA reach deal to form South African government of national unity - BBC.com
articles.description: The African National Congress and the Democratic Alliance will put aside their decades-long rivalry to work together.
articles.content:
By Farouk Chothia and Danai Nesta Kupemba and Barbra Plett-Usher in Cape Town, BBC News
South Africa's governing African National Congress (ANC) and the main opposition Democratic Alliance (DA) have… [+4637 chars]
